  • Uses of Player in it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.utils

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.utils that return Player
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected Player
    CalculatorTeacherOwnership.getNewPlayerOwnerOfTeacherOfColor(Teacher t)
    Given a teacher compare each player's number of students on the dining table according to the teacher's color, returns the teacher's new owner (the player with most students on the dining table)
    protected Player
    CalculatorTeacherOwnership.getPlayerWithTeacherOfColor(ColorCharacter color)
    Given a student color, compare all players and return the player who has the teacher of that color
    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.utils that return types with arguments of type Player
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<Player>
    CalculatorInfluence.evaluate(List<Player> players, Island island)
    If the game's rules include teams of players this function evaluates team influence: at first it creates teams from the list of players; for each team(a list of players with the same color) it evaluates the team influence which will be the sum of each team member's influence; then it compares each team's influence, in case it founds a most influencing team, return the list of players of the most influencing team; in case of a draw(no team has a unique maximal value of influence), it frees the current island and returns an empty player list.
    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.utils with parameters of type Player
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected void
    CalculatorTeacherOwnership.addTeacherToPlayerWithHighestNumberOfStudentOfColor(Player currentPlayer, Player oldOwner, Teacher teacher)
    Applies normalOwnershipCondition method on current player and old owner of the teacher
    void
    CalculatorTeacherOwnership.evaluate(Player player, ColorCharacter color, List<Player> players)
    Given a list of players evaluate the teacher's owner
    int
    CalculatorInfluence.evaluateForPlayer(Player player, Island island)
    Sum tower influence and student influence of the player
    protected void
    CalculatorTeacherOwnership.normalOwnershipCondition(Player oldOwner, Teacher teacher)
    Teacher ownership condition for a player: highest number of students on the teacher's color dining table if old owner still has the teacher ownership condition, keep the teacher on its school If another player has teacher ownership condition, move teacher from old owner's school to new owner school
    protected int
    CalculatorInfluence.playerStudentInfluence(Player player, Island island)
    Given a player and an island of the board, calculate the influence brought by the students on the island itself.
    protected int
    CalculatorInfluence.playerTowerInfluence(Player player, Island island)
    Given a player and an island of the board, returns the influence given by the control of any tower on that island.
    Method parameters in it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.utils with type arguments of type Player
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<Player>
    CalculatorInfluence.evaluate(List<Player> players, Island island)
    If the game's rules include teams of players this function evaluates team influence: at first it creates teams from the list of players; for each team(a list of players with the same color) it evaluates the team influence which will be the sum of each team member's influence; then it compares each team's influence, in case it founds a most influencing team, return the list of players of the most influencing team; in case of a draw(no team has a unique maximal value of influence), it frees the current island and returns an empty player list.
    void
    CalculatorTeacherOwnership.evaluate(Player player, ColorCharacter color, List<Player> players)
